title: Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19 ...
summary: This post introduces the Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model (SPAM) for disease mapping, focusing on spatio-temporal analysis to understand disease patterns across spatial units and over time using relevant datasets.
usefulness_reason: Score 80 assigned because the post directly discusses 'Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model' and 'Spatio-temporal analysis' in the context of disease mapping, explicitly mentioning spatial and temporal domains and datasets.
